channel.title: sketchthedocs on Visual Azure
channel.description: Recent content in sketchthedocs on Visual Azure

item.title: #002 | A Visual Guide To Visual Storytelling!
item.description: The Talk! Yesterday, I gave a talk to the Microsoft Student Ambassadors community on one of my favorite topics: Visual Storytelling. You can find the the slides on Speakerdeck. Feel free to go check them out! I’ll wait. I’ve given versions of this talk before, but this time I did something extra – I also sketchnoted it, and captured a 30-second video replay of my process creating it. Very meta, right?
